name: Banana Wild Blueberry Smoothie With Chia Seeds
description: Because I use frozen organic wild blueberries for this, I don’t need to add any ice cubes. You’ll need to soak the chia seeds for several hours or overnight.
keywords: banana, chia seeds, frozen blueberries, gluten-free, halal, healthy, high fiber, kosher, low cholesterol, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon soaked chia seeds (1 teaspoon dry unsoaked)
1 small banana (about 4 ounces without the skin)

recipeInstructions.text: To soak the chia seeds, place in a jar or bowl and add 4 tablespoons water for every tablespoon of chia seeds. Place in the refrigerator for several hours or overnight. The seeds and water will be become gelatinous.

Scoop up a tablespoon of seeds with the gooey liquid and place in a blender (don’t worry, your smoothie won’t have this consistency). Add the remaining ingredients and blend for 1 full minute at high speed.
